text: James Foley may refer to: * James Foley (cricketer) (1898–1969), Irish cricketer * James Foley (director) (born 1953), American film director and screenwriter * James Foley (journalist) (1973–2014), American journalist, beheaded by ISIL in 2014 * James A. Foley (1882–1946), American lawyer and politician from New York * James Bradford Foley (1807–1886), United States Representative from Indiana * James D. Foley (born 1942), American university professor in the field of human-computer interaction * James L. Foley Jr. (1885–?), American politician and farmer * James Thomas Foley (1910–1990), American judge * James Brendan Foley (born 1957), U.S. diplomat * James Foley (bishop) (born 1948), Australian Roman Catholic bishop == See also == * Jim Foley (born 1946), Canadian football player
title: James Foley
